attributes.action: ask Ofcom to require Sky and Virgin Media to carry each other's channels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sky and Virgin Media have failed to agree a deal to carry each other's channels so as a result Virgin Media are no longer showing Sky One and Sky News. It is in the public interest for rival cable and satellite platforms to carry all non-premium channels otherwise the market will rapidly fragment to the detriment of viewers of all services. Ofcom have a responsibility to ensure this does not happen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
